name: Emergency Containment Protocols
description: Training in rapid containment strategies for biological outbreaks and bioweapon releases.

cards.title: Rapid Response to Biohazard Incidents
cards.description: Emergency procedures for handling sudden pathogen outbreaks or bioweapon releases.
cards.bulletpoints: First responder coordination, decontamination drills, isolation protocols

cards.title: Deployment of Mobile Containment Units
cards.description: Setting up field containment zones and temporary biohazard response stations.
cards.bulletpoints: Mobile quarantine tents, rapid diagnostic stations, emergency airlocks

cards.title: Counteracting Bioweapon Dispersal Methods
cards.description: Identifying and neutralizing different delivery methods used in bioterrorism.
cards.bulletpoints: Aerosolized dispersal, water supply contamination, foodborne pathogen mitigation
